quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% in 2024.
issue: BLS data shows 4.0-4.2% range in 2024, not 3.5%. Source: bls.gov/news.release/empsit.nr0.htm

quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% in 2024.
issue: Unsupported claim lacks source; BLS data shows 2024 rate was 3.7-4.0%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2024/
